message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. Would you like to buy it from me for $100?
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I'm looking for a better deal. I'm willing to pay $80 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob, but I have to make a living. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $90.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $80. How about $85?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $92.50.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still looking for a better deal. How about $87.50?
I've already made a significant concession, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $95. It's a fair price considering the product's value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $95.
I understand that you've made concessions, but $95 is still too high for me. I'm willing to pay $85, can you meet me there?
